Summary: woke up to glowing light in bedroom with all lights off/bleeding upon waking up
trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Scottsdale
There were no other sightings in Scottsdale on or around July 18th 2009
divs: Sighting Detailsseveral weeks ago i woke up to a fog-like mist in my bedroom,i sat up and in the mist a pair of "eyes",more like someting electronic stared at me ..i panicked and turned on my lamp and it was gone.This was not a dream or a hallucination..however i just started to forget about it when i woke up last nite to a glowing light in my room,all the lights were turned off.i layed there paralyzed..then i finally swung my legs around and began to get up..the light shut off just like a switch.I eventually went back to bed,but when i woke up i felt a pain in my belly button..i looked down and my belly button was bleeding and extremely red and inflamed.what is happening? i am terrified to go to sleep.Also the electricity in my room in the area where this happens is constantly going in and out.sometimes it works and other times it doesnt.please help,don't know what to do.
